task.description: Add comprehensive request validation to REST endpoints to ensure data integrity and provide clear error messages for invalid requests.

acceptance-criteria.criterion: Bean Validation annotations on request DTOs
Custom validators for complex validation rules
Validation errors return 400 with detailed messages
HTML content validation (not empty, size limits)

implementation-notes.note: Use Bean Validation annotations: - @NotBlank for required fields - @Size for length constraints - @Pattern for format validation - @Min/@Max for numeric ranges

HtmlRequest validation: - html: @NotBlank, @Size(max=1000000)
UrlRequest validation: - url: @NotBlank, @Pattern(regexp=URL_REGEX)

Create @ControllerAdvice for global exception handling: - MethodArgumentNotValidException → 400 with field errors - PdfGenerationException → 500 with error message - ChromeNotFoundException → 503 Service Unavailable
Return JSON error response with structure: { "error": "...", "details": [...] }

testing-requirements.requirement: Test invalid PDF options (scale out of range, etc.)
Verify error responses have correct structure and status codes
